spec_data.Name: python2-bottle
spec_data.Description:
Bottle is a fast and simple micro-framework for small web-applications.
It offers request dispatching (Routes) with URL parameter support, Templates,
a built-in HTTP Server and adapters for many third party WSGI/HTTP-server and
template engines. All in a single file and with no dependencies other than the
Python Standard Library.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 25 Feb 2017 09:34:23 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Fast and simple WSGI-framework for small web-applications
